Whitworth Undergraduate Tuition and Fees

In 2019-2020, the average part-time undergraduate tuition at Whitworth was $1,877 per credit hour for both in-state and out-of-state students. The average full-time tuition and fees for undergraduates are shown in the table below.

Does Whitworth Offer an Online BA in Theology & Religious Vocations?

Whitworth does not offer an online option for its theology and religious vocations bachelorâs degree program at this time. To see if the school offers distance learning options in other areas, visit the Whitworth Online Learning page.
